article_reference.title: LT: How to Request a 401(k) Termination Cash Withdrawal or Rollover

participant_data.field: Confirmation participant has left their employer
participant_data.description: The participant confirms they are separated from service and are requesting a termination distribution.
participant_data.why_needed: Determines that the request is a termination or separation distribution covered by this process.

participant_data.description: Whether the participant wants a lump sum cash distribution, a full rollover, or a partial rollover plus partial cash.
participant_data.why_needed: Determines which portal options and delivery details are required.

participant_data.description: At least one valid email address used for confirmation updates or inquiries during processing.
participant_data.why_needed: Required by the portal submission flow to receive updates or inquiries.

participant_data.description: The postal mailing address used for check delivery and contact.
participant_data.why_needed: Needed for check delivery and participant contact.

participant_data.description: Receiving institution information for an IRA or new employer plan, including an IRA or account number if applicable.
participant_data.why_needed: Required to complete a rollover delivery section in the portal or on the electronic form.

plan_data.description: The current status of the plan, which must be Active or Pending Termination.
plan_data.why_needed: To ensure the plan is eligible for distribution.

plan_data.description: The employment status of the participant, which must be Terminated.
The date the participant's employment was terminated.
plan_data.why_needed: To verify eligibility based on termination date.

plan_data.description: The date the participant was rehired, if applicable.
plan_data.why_needed: To ensure the termination date is after the rehire date for eligibility.

plan_data.description: Whether the participant is enrolled in Multi-Factor Authentication.
plan_data.why_needed: To confirm security requirements for processing the request.
